title: Cat journey
creator_credit: Svenska filminstitutet, Educational Media International and Lisbeth Gabrielsson
brief_description: Katie meets a friendly cat which takes her for a rather adventurous ride on its back. Their journey is full of many strange and sometimes scary encounters, but the cat is always there to save Katie. Adapted from the picture book by Ivar Arosenius. Suitable for children 4-7 years.
creator_credit_for_label: Svenska filminstitutet, Educational Media International and Lisbeth Gabrielsson
